thread.title: Nassar says it's too hard to listen to victims, judge calls him 'delusional'

title: Nassar says it's too hard to listen to victims, judge calls him 'delusional'
text:
Nassar says it's too hard to listen to victims, judge calls him 'delusional' 12:15am IST - 01:36 
The judge presiding over former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar's sentencing hearing admonishes him after he complains that it's too hard to listen to victim's testimony. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The judge presiding over former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar's sentencing hearing admonishes him after he complains that it's too hard to listen to victim's testimony. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2mNXgaf
